name: SC BI Score
functionStatement: Physical and chemical conditions enable spawning, juvenile growth, migration, and stress survival of target taxa.
descriptionMarkdown: Biological integrity metric (IBI/MMI/OE) indicating whether habitat and water quality support native aquatic communities.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel
